Title: Shutdown
Description: A small simple tool, for shutting down, rebooting or loging off your computer, after a certain amount of time.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
A small simple tool, for shutting down, rebooting or loging off your computer, after a certain amount of time.

The new and improved Shutdown.

Shutdown is an application that like the name implies is used to shutdown your
computer after a certain amount of time. It can also be used reboot or logoff.
(Works on Windows Vista and Windows7)

Its designed to be super slick and simple to use.

- No installation required.
- Only requirement is that you have .NET installed (ver 4.0 or newer).
- Works in Windows Vista and Win7.
